title: MD
biography: The director of the Intelligence Bureau (DIB) is the head of the Intelligence Bureau, India's premier domestic-intelligence agency. The current director of the Intelligence Bureau is Tapan Deka, the longest-serving director in the Bureau's history, incumbent since 1 July 2022.
aiSummary: D. C. Deka is a maternal mortality specialist with an H-index of 110 at Obstetrics (Faculty). Has been published in Catalysis Science & Technology, Advances in Applied Science Research. Based in India.
